member.name: T:Simple.MPD.Commands.Range
member.summary: Represents a range of songs or entries

member.name: P:Simple.MPD.Commands.Range.End
member.summary: End of the range, NOT included

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.Commands.SetVol.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: Between 0 and 100, out of range values throws an exception

member.name: P:Simple.MPD.Commands.Pause.PauseState
member.summary: Pause state for the current command

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.Commands.Play.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance without arguments

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.Commands.Play.PlaySongId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of "playid" command with SongId argument

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.Commands.Play.PlaySongPosition(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of "play" command with SongPos argument

member.name: F:Simple.MPD.Commands.Idle.SubSystems.Database
member.summary: the song database has been modified after update

member.name: F:Simple.MPD.Commands.Idle.SubSystems.Update
member.summary: a database update has started or finished. If the database was modified during the update, the database event is also emitted.

member.name: F:Simple.MPD.Commands.Idle.SubSystems.Stored_Playlist
member.summary: a stored playlist has been modified, renamed, created or deleted

member.name: F:Simple.MPD.Commands.Idle.SubSystems.Playlist
member.summary: the queue (i.e. the current playlist) has been modified

member.name: F:Simple.MPD.Commands.Idle.SubSystems.Player
member.summary: the player has been started, stopped or seeked or tags of the currently playing song have changed (e.g. received from stream)

member.name: F:Simple.MPD.Commands.Idle.SubSystems.Output
member.summary: an audio output has been added, removed or modified (e.g. renamed, enabled or disabled)

member.name: F:Simple.MPD.Commands.Idle.SubSystems.Options
member.summary: options like repeat, random, crossfade, replay gain

member.name: F:Simple.MPD.Commands.Idle.SubSystems.Partition
member.summary: a partition was added, removed or changed

member.name: F:Simple.MPD.Commands.Idle.SubSystems.Sticker
member.summary: the sticker database has been modified.

member.name: F:Simple.MPD.Commands.Idle.SubSystems.Subscription
member.summary: a client has subscribed or unsubscribed to a channel

member.name: F:Simple.MPD.Commands.Idle.SubSystems.Message
member.summary: a message was received on a channel this client is subscribed to; this event is only emitted when the queue is empty

member.name: F:Simple.MPD.Commands.Idle.SubSystems.Neighbor
member.summary: a neighbor was found or lost

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.Commands.Shuffle.#ctor(Simple.MPD.Commands.Range)
member.summary: Creates a new instance with range

member.summary: Creates a new exception from text

member.summary: Represents a directory structure in the MPD server

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.Helper.MpdDirectory.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MpdExtension.AddLocalM3uFile(Simple.MPD.MPD,System.String,System.Func{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Rerads a Local m3u file with MPD music locations and adds to queue
member.param: Function to convert local path to remote path
member.returns: Tuple with MPD file added and it's SongID

member.name: P:Simple.MPD.Interfaces.IConnection.IsConnected
member.summary: Get if the connection is active

member.name: P:Simple.MPD.MPD.IsIdle
member.summary: Reports if is in Idle. Do NOT send commands while in Idle

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.ExecuteCommandAsync(Simple.MPD.Interfaces.ICommand)
member.summary: Executes a command in a concurrent-safe manmer

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.GetConfigAsync
member.summary: Dumps configuration values that may be interesting for the client. This command is only permitted to local clients (connected via local socket).

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.GetCommandsAsync
member.summary: Shows which commands the current user has access to

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.GetNotCommandsAsync
member.summary: Shows which commands the current user does not have access to

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.GetUrlHandlersAsync
member.summary: Gets a list of available URL handlers

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.GetDecodersAsync
member.summary: Print a list of decoder plugins, followed by their supported suffixes and MIME types

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.GetStatusAsync
member.summary: Reports the current status of the player and the volume level

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.GetCurrentSongAsync
member.summary: Displays the song info of the current song

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.Idle(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Waits until there is a noteworthy change in one or more of MPDs subsystems. As soon as there is one, it lists all changed systems in a line in the format `changed: SUBSYSTEM` Any command sent while in Idle wil raise an IdleException

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.SetConsumeAsync(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets consume state. When consume is activated, each song played is removed from playlist

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.SetSingle(Simple.MPD.SingleStates)
member.summary: Sets single state, STATE should be On, Off or OneShot. When single is activated, playback is stopped after current song, or song is repeated if the repeat mode is enabled

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.SetVolumeAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets volume, the range of volume is 0-100. Out of range values will be truncated

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.PlayAsync
member.summary: Begins playing the playlist at current song

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.PlaySongPosAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Begins playing the playlist at song number SongPosition

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.PlaySongIdAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Begins playing the playlist at song SongId

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.NextAsync
member.summary: Plays next song in the playlist

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.PreviousAsync
member.summary: Plays previous song in the playlist

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.GetQueue
member.summary: Displays a list of all songs in the queue, internally uses the `playlistinfo` command

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.QueueAdd(System.String)
member.summary: Adds the file URI to the playlist (directories add recursively). URI can also be a single file. Clients that are connected via local socket may add arbitrary local files(URI is an absolute path)

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.QueueAddId(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds a song to the playlist (non-recursive) and returns the song id. URI is always a single file or URL

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.QueueDelete(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a song from the playlist

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.QueueDeleteId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes the song SONGID from the playlist

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.SwapPos(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Swaps the positions of pos1 and pos2

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.SwapId(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Swaps the positions of id1 and id2

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.MoveRange(Simple.MPD.Commands.Range,System.Int32)
member.summary: Move songs at range to specified position

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.MovePos(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Move song from to specified position

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.MoveId(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Move song with Id to specified position

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.ListPlaylists
member.summary: Prints a list of the playlist directory

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.ListPlaylistInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Lists the songs with metadata in the playlist

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.Load(System.String,Simple.MPD.Commands.Range)
member.summary: Loads the playlist (or a range) into the current queue

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.SaveQueue(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the queue as a playlist

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.PlaylistMove(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the song at position FROM to the position TO

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.ListAll
member.summary: Do not use this command. Lists all songs and directories in URI. Do not manage a client-side copy of MPDs database. That is fragile and adds huge overhead. It will break with large databases. Instead, query MPD whenever you need something.

member.name: M:Simple.MPD.MPD.LsInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Lists the contents of the directory URI

member.summary: Search the database for songs matching expression (case-sensitive)

member.summary: Search the database for songs matching expression (case-sensitive)

member.summary: Search the database for songs matching expression (case-INsensitive)

member.summary: Search the database for songs matching expression (case-INsensitive)

member.summary: Creates a MPD-Client connection and notifies events

member.summary: Directory name, NULL for files, playlists, etc

member.summary: Playlist file path, NULL for songs and directories

member.name: P:Simple.MPD.Responses.SongInfo.Name
member.summary: A name for this song. This is not the song title. The exact meaning of this tag is not well-defined in the standard

member.name: P:Simple.MPD.Responses.SongInfo.Elapsed
member.summary: Total time elapsed within the song

member.summary: The album id in the MusicBrainz database

member.summary: The artist id in the MusicBrainz database

member.summary: The album artist id in the MusicBrainz database

member.name: P:Simple.MPD.Responses.SongInfo.MUSICBRAINZ_RELEASETRACKID
member.summary: The release track id in the MusicBrainz database

member.name: P:Simple.MPD.Responses.SongInfo.MUSICBRAINZ_TRACKID
member.summary: The track id in the MusicBrainz database

member.name: P:Simple.MPD.Responses.SongInfo.AlbumArtist
member.summary: On multi-artist albums, this is the artist name which shall be used for the whole album

member.name: P:Simple.MPD.Responses.SongInfo.ArtistSort
member.summary: Same as artist, but for sorting

member.name: P:Simple.MPD.Responses.SongInfo.AlbumArtistSort
member.summary: Same as albumartist, but for sorting

member.name: P:Simple.MPD.Responses.SongInfo.AlbumSort
member.summary: Same as album, but for sorting

member.name: P:Simple.MPD.Responses.SongInfo.Track
member.summary: The decimal track number within the album

member.summary: The artist who composed the song

member.name: P:Simple.MPD.Responses.SongInfo.Performer
member.summary: The artist who performed the song

member.name: P:Simple.MPD.Responses.SongInfo.Conductor
member.summary: The conductor who conducted the song

member.name: P:Simple.MPD.Responses.SongInfo.LastModified
member.summary: the time stamp of the last modification of the underlying file

member.name: P:Simple.MPD.Responses.SongInfo.Format
member.summary: The audio format of the song (or an approximation to a format supported by MPD and the decoder plugin being used). When playing this file, the audio value in the status response should be the same

member.summary: Reports the current status of the player and the volume level

member.name: P:Simple.MPD.Responses.Status.Partition
member.summary: the name of the current partition
